name: Runners
overview: A simple vertically scrolling road shooter with pretty good music for a SEUCK game. Just as you thought it was safe to drive home from a boring day at work after being on duty as a cop. You finally get some action occuring on the road. Your arm yourself with a pistol ready to stop those criminals who are driving dangerously. It turns out those bad gangsters have been robbing homes and shops. As a road cop, your mission is to shoot at those cars and stop those gangsters from making a get-away from their dirty deeds. Can you stop them, or will your city be total chaos?
